Package de.ralleytn.simple.input

Class GamepadEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.input.DeviceEvent
      • de.ralleytn.simple.input.GamepadEvent

  • public class GamepadEvent
extends DeviceEvent
    Represents an event that was fired by a gamepad.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GamepadEvent

        public GamepadEvent​(Device device,
                    Direction direction,
                    int analogStick,
                    net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier id,
                    float intensity)
        Parameters:
        device - the device that fired this event
        direction - the direction the POV or an analog stick is facing
        analogStick - the analog stick associated with this event
        id - the component identifier (only important for the buttons)
        intensity - the intensity with which an analog stick is pushed
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getDirection

        public final Direction getDirection​()
        Returns:
